articles.author: Obaid Khan
articles.title: Opener Scholfield sets tone as Oval Invincibles open with big win
articles.description: Partnership between Paige Scholfield and Alice Capsey underpins convincing win over Phoenix.
articles.content: A sparkling 71 from Paige Scholfield took Oval Invincibles to a domineering 45-run victory against Birmingham Phoenix in the first game of the fourth year of the Hundred...

articles.author: Nagraj Gollapudi
articles.title: What is the road ahead for Jadeja, Shami, Hardik and Rahul?
articles.description: We go behind the scenes to bring you all the answers to your questions about India's selections for the white-ball tour of Sri Lanka
articles.content: After the announcement of India's squads for the white-ball tour of Sri Lanka, the immediate headlines focussed on Suryakumar Yadav's appointment as T20I captain...

articles.author: Obaid Khan
articles.title: Oval Invincibles land statement win as Zampa, Mahmood, Amir thrive
articles.description: Billings, Malan seal emphatic eight-wicket win over Birmingham Phoenix at The Oval
articles.content: Defending champions Oval Invincibles romped to victory under the lights at The Kia Oval as the fourth year of The Hundred got underway with two wins out of two...

articles.author: Unknown
articles.title: John Turner's best blasts Essex out of competition
articles.description: Eagles needed a point to overtake Gloucestershire into fourth but were undone by Turner's 4 for 23
articles.content: Hampshire 181 for 5 (McDermott 64, Vince 41, Prest 41) beat Essex 174 for 7 (Allison 69*, Benkenstein 54, Turner 4-23) by seven runs. Hampshire Hawks fast bowler John Turner's best T20 figures knocked Essex out of the Vitality Blast...

articles.author: Obaid Khan
articles.title: Daniel Hughes, Harrison Ward pound Middlesex in nine-wicket win
articles.description: Robinson in the wickets as Sussex seal home quarter-final for Sussex
articles.content: Sussex Sharks secured a home quarter-final in the Vitality Blast after thrashing Middlesex by nine wickets in front of a sell-out crowd at Hove. They leapfrogged Somerset, who lost heavily to Glamorgan in Cardiff...

articles.author: Unknown
articles.title: Cameron Bancroft downs Middlesex to keep Gloucestershire in contention
articles.description: Opener makes 87 from 54 balls in contest dominated by top-order contributions
articles.content: Gloucestershire 179 for 8 (Bancroft 87) beat Middlesex 169 for 7 (du Plooy 73*, Andersson 49) by 10 runs. Cameron Bancroft produced his best Vitality Blast performance with a knock of 87 from 54 balls as Gloucestershire held off Middlesex to keep their hopes of a quarter-final place alive...
